# Freedom of Movement
## Overview
**Aura** moderate abjuration; **CL** 7th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 40,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This gold ring allows the wearer to act as if continually under the effect of a *[[Freedom of Movement (Spell)|freedom of movement]]* spell.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Freedom of Movement (Spell)|freedom of movement]]*

**Cost** 20,000 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 481
